alert.note: Alert for Brazoria; Fort Bend; Galveston; Harris; Matagorda (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 24 at 2:00PM CST until January 24 at 2:30PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Galveston County in southeastern Texas... Southeastern Fort Bend County in southeastern Texas... Brazoria County in southeastern Texas... East central Matagorda County in southeastern Texas... South central Harris County in southeastern Texas... * Until 230 PM CST. * At 159 PM CST, a line of severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Arcola to Holiday Lakes to near Sweeny, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southern Pasadena, Pearland, League City, southeastern Missouri City, Galveston Island West End, Friendswood, Lake Jackson, Alvin, Angleton, Dickinson, Santa Fe, Freeport, Clute, Webster, Hitchcock, Manvel, West Columbia, Sweeny, Surfside Beach and Clear Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Brazoria; Fort Bend; Galveston; Harris; Matagorda
